snippet: The Kings expressed disappointment and frustration after missing scoring opportunities and failing in their attempt to win Game 4 and their franchise’s first Stanley Cup.
abstract: Los Angeles Kings express disappointment and frustration after missing scoring opportunities in Game 4 and failing to sweep the New Jersey Devils in pursuit of the Kings' first Stanley Cup.
lead_paragraph: The Kings expressed disappointment and frustration after missing scoring opportunities and failing in their attempt to win Game 4 and their franchise’s first Stanley Cup.

headline.seo: With Chance to Sweep, Kings Regret One That Got Away
headline.main: The Kings Let Their Chance Slip Away
headline.print_headline: The Kings Let Their Chance Slip Away
headline.content_kicker: Stanley Cup Finals Game 4: Devils 3, Kings 1
